BendingMoment.generation 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Articles
    Bendingmoment

    Bending moment of 9 types of truck

    BendingMoment.Rd

    When a truck travels on a bridges, we use static influence line to calculate unit load bending moment. We assume truck velocity is v(m/s), and Observation frequency is Hz,so We will get a sequence of bending moments within BridgeL/v time, every 1/Hz seconds, at the mid-span of bridge.

    Usage

    BendingMoment(Trucktype, BridgeL, v, Hz, NoiseLevel)

    Arguments

    Trucktype

    9 types of trucks, with 1-9

    BridgeL

    Length of bridge (m)

    v

    velocity of truck (m/s)

    Hz

    Observation frequency.

    NoiseLevel

    Usually 5%, 10%, 15%, 20% noise to simulate the real data.

    Value

    A sequence of bending moments generated at mid-span of bridge, within BridgeL/v time, every 1/Hz seconds.

    IL

    Static Influence Line of Bridge

    Details

    We want to return a sequence of bending moments at BridgeL/v time, every 1/Hz seconds, at the mid-span of bridge. and in order to make data real, we add Noiselevel into data, and we have 9 types of default trucks, each has different alxes load and alxes spacings, which was indicated in internal data.

    Author

    Qian Shi

    Examples

    BendingMoment(1,100,50,50,0.15)
